== How can I help with Ubuntu? ==

Many people who enjoy using Ubuntu would like to give back and improve the distribution. I have collected a checklist of how a motivated person could help the Ubuntu community based on proficiency.

=== Beginner ===
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/InternetRelayChat|IRC]]</nowiki> Presence
* Mailing List presence - See all <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/|Ubuntu Mailing Lists]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MailingListFAQs|FAQ]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://help.launchpad.net/ListHelp|Launchpad Mailing List Help]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuForums|Forum]]</nowiki> Presence
* Join a <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Teams|Teams]]</nowiki>
* Join a Local Community "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LoCoTeams|LoCo]]</nowiki>" Ubuntu user group
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UserDocumentation|Reporting bugs]]</nowiki> - See article <nowiki>[[http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/bugs.html|"How to report bugs efficiently"]]</nowiki>

=== Intermediary ===
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/HowToTriage|Bug Triage]]</nowiki> and Testing - See <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/EasyTasks| Easy Bug Tasks]]</nowiki>
* Stale bug checking/updating
* Creating new (and updating untouched) <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UserDocumentation|documentation]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Translations|Translations]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BugSquad/AdoptPackage|Adopt a package]]</nowiki>
* Distribution <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing|Testing]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://testcases.qa.ubuntu.com/|Test cases]]</nowiki>
* Version tracking and synchronization requesting

=== Advanced ===
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/PatchTesting|Patch testing]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/Patches|review]]</nowiki> and notifying upstream of patches
* Bug <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/Assignment|assignment/ownership]]</nowiki>
* Bug <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/HowToFix|fixing]]</nowiki>
* Upstream updating of changes we make, directions we are taking, release schedule notifying
* Creating a <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+ppas|PPA]]</nowiki> with the latest stable/experimental upstream version of a package - See <nowiki>[[https://help.launchpad.net/Packaging/PPA|PPA Help]]</nowiki>

Other ways of helping can be found at the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Signpost/Answers|Signpost]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Upstream/Contacts|Upstream Contacts]]</nowiki> wiki pages.
